headline: Jim Cramer Says Darden Restaurants, Inc. (DRI)’s Olive Garden Can Come Back
summary: We recently published 12 Hot, Cold & Stable Stocks Jim Cramer Recently Discussed. Darden Restaurants, Inc. (NYSE:DRI) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Darden Restaurants, Inc. (NYSE:DRI)’s shares faced significant pressure last week when they dipped by 11.5%. According to media reports, the shares fell after the firm’s fiscal first-quarter earnings report. […]
